members.name: sign
members.comment: Signs a file into an OutputStream. This method will not close file or os. If an I/O error or signing error occurs during the signing, then it may do so after some bytes have been written. Consequently, the output stream may be in an inconsistent state. It is strongly recommended that it be promptly closed in this case.

throws: JarSignerException - if the signing fails.

members.name: getDigestAlgorithm
members.comment: Returns the digest algorithm for this JarSigner. The return value is never null.

members.name: getSignatureAlgorithm
members.comment: Returns the signature algorithm for this JarSigner. The return value is never null.

members.name: getTsa
members.comment: Returns the URI of the Time Stamping Authority (TSA).

members.name: getSignerName
members.comment: Returns the signer name of this JarSigner. The return value is never null.

members.name: getProperty
members.comment: Returns the value of an additional implementation-specific property indicated by the specified key. If a property is not set but has a default value, the default value will be returned.

implNote: See JarSigner.Builder.setProperty(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) for a list of properties this implementation supports. All property names are case-insensitive.
throws: UnsupportedOperationException - if the key is not supported by this implementation.

name: jdk.security.jarsigner.JarSigner
